message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. It's a great deal for you, as you know the value is higher than that. Let me know what you think!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $8,500 for the product. Please let me know if this is something we can agree on.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $8,500 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a little, but I need at least $9,000 to make this worthwhile.  Let's meet in the middle.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. I'm still interested in purchasing the product, but I can only commit to $8,750. This is the highest amount I can afford right now. Let me know if this is within your range.
